subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: {{lang|zh|闫}} was included as the simplified form of {{l|zh|阎}} in the {{w|Second round of simplified Chinese characters|second round of simplification}} in 1977. The current standard in Mainland China, the {{w|Table of General Standard Chinese Characters}} ({{w2|zh|通用规范汉字表}}), does not mention that {{lang|zh|闫}} is a simplification of {{l|zh|阎}}. ''{{w|A Dictionary of Current Chinese}}'' ({{w2|zh|现代汉语词典}}) and the ''Xinhua Dictionary'' ({{w2|zh|新华字典}}) list {{lang|zh|闫}} as a separate entry from {{l|zh|阎}} (unlike other variants, which are usually put beside the main character in parentheses), while ''{{w|Xiandai Hanyu Guifan Cidian}}'' ({{w2|zh|pref=《|现代汉语规范词典|suf=》}}) proscribes the use of {{lang|zh|闫}} as the simplified form of {{l|zh|阎}}.
